text: toobat kak oggolimam umaaneena Abaah Amok teetik kate waa maray Rabi keenik numuk teynah yamaate waqdi, Diggah Anu taway Yallal gacaah toobatah iyya mara hinna, usun koroosannut edde anuk Raba mara hinna, woo maray Rabba iyyam fanah umaanek Amok katewaah Qansarissa digaala keenih massosne Akeeral
